example.text: From his first day in office, Biden has failed to uphold his Constitutional responsibility to enforce our laws, defend our sovereignty, and protect our citizens. As a result, he has created the worst humanitarian and security crisis at our southern border in America’s history. ?

If we fail to act, we will lose our country as we know it. I look forward to working with all my colleagues to ensure the next generations of Americans inherit the same freedoms and opportunities we did.
I am proud to support HR 2, the Secure the Border Act, which will cut off the unmitigated flow of drugs, gang violence, and criminals pouring across our border into our country. ?

Biden does not have the will to do anything about the deluge of crime, drugs, and gang violence coming across our southern border. The president continues to placate the Left instead of putting our citizens and their safety first. [[user]] [[url]]

From his first day in office, Biden has failed to uphold his Constitutional responsibility to enforce our laws, defend our sovereignty, and protect our citizens. As a result, he has created the worst humanitarian and security crisis at our southern border in America’s history. ?

Since being signed into law in 2020, USMCA has increased the quantity of trade between these countries while creating tens of thousands of American jobs in the agriculture and energy industries. It's an honor to serve as your voice in our nation's capital.
I am proud to support HR 2, the Secure the Border Act, which will cut off the unmitigated flow of drugs, gang violence, and criminals pouring across our border into our country. ?
